name: Pukan, Bye-Bye!
overview: Let's talk a bit about the difficulty in video games. Have you ever heard the definition of «hard»? It's «done with a great deal of force or strength». Well, Pukan Bye-Bye has been created with a great deal of strength and it requires the player to match the expectations. But that doesn't mean that the game is hard by itself. Only by playing it with your own eyes, hands or whatever suits your fancy, you'll be able to estimate if it's challenging or not. Of course, any player will surely require more patience to excel in it. So, buddy, are you bold enough to rise to the challenge?
